message: Hi Bob, I have a great product I think you'd be interested in. I'm willing to sell it to you for $95.  Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Bob, I appreciate your offer.  I'm willing to come down a little bit, but I'm still hoping to get closer to $90. Would you be willing to meet me at $88?
I'm still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to meet you halfway between $85 and $88. How about $86.50?
